concept.title: The Logical Channel
concept.shortdesc: This document describes how device driver code is accessed through a logical channel.

section.p: All interaction between user code and the driver code takes place through a logical channel. On the user side, a channel is encapsulated by a RBusLogicalChannel derived class; on the Kernel side, a channel is encapsulated by a DLogicalChannelBase or a DLogicalChannel derived class, constructed by the DLogicalDevice factory object.
